name: Helicopter_Physics
description:
Press Escape To Reset The Level

Thank you very much for checking out the project, the movement of the helicopter is entirely physics based, with no animations.

The project is not meant to be a game, but more of a learning project, to learn & improve my game development portfolio. 

I am uploading a game every month for the rest of the year, feel free to check out my previous projects:

Game Uploads :8.2022(Helicopter Physics), 7.2022 ( Mad Scientist, Rogue Survivor),  6.2022(Lost Alien),5.2022(Project Resurrection) , 4.2022(Cave Runner)
